dod-thrift-savings-plan.title: Thrift Savings Plan (TSP)
dod-thrift-savings-plan.headline: Thrift Savings Plan (TSP)
dod-thrift-savings-plan.source.name: Department of Defense
dod-thrift-savings-plan.summary: The Thrift Savings Plan (TSP) is a federal government-sponsored retirement savings and investment plan available to members of the uniformed services.
dod-thrift-savings-plan.eligibility.labe: You are at least 60 years old.
You served in the active military, naval or air service.
